title: Papyrus Scarab
summaries: The Papyrus Scarab is a Hardmode, post-Plantera accessory that combines the bonuses of the Necromantic Scroll and the Hercules Beetle. When equipped, it increases the damage of summon weapons by 15%, increases their knockback by 2, and increases the player's maximum number of minions by one.
